metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16707 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: Hunspell 1.7.0 has an invalid read operation in SuggestMgr::leftcommonsubstring in suggestmgr.cxx.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> doesn't look like suggestmgr.cxx is built in firefox package

criterions.comment: calibre package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
focuswriter package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
hunspell package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
